mapper.insert: insert into user_account(openid, total_quota, surplus_quota, model_types, status, create_time, update_time) values (#{openid}, #{totalQuota}, #{surplusQuota}, #{modelTypes}, #{status}, now(), now())
mapper.update: UPDATE user_account set surplus_quota = surplus_quota - 1, update_time = now() where openid = #{openid} and surplus_quota > 0 and status = 0
